column3: Go to the DOAJ admin Journals and Articles search at /admin/admin_site_search
Open the "Journals vs Articles" facet and select "Articles"

column4: Only articles are visible in the search results

column3: Find an article that has a DOI and click on it

column4: You are linked through the DOI to the journal page

column3: Find an article that author has an ORCID iD and click on it

column4: You are linked through the logo to the relevant orcid.org profile website

column3: Find an article that has a Full text link

column4: You are taken to the publisher's copy of the full text

column3: Click "Delete this article" at the bottom of a search result

column4: The operation is cancelled, the article is not deleted

column3: Click "Delete this article" at the bottom of a search result

column4: A confirmation box appears saying the operation was successful
The article disappears from the search results
